title: Green Revolution's use of new technologies

content.prompt: Which of the following is characteristic of the Green Revolution of the 1960s through the 1980s?

choices.label: It restored tropical forests destroyed by slash-and-burn agriculture.
It prevented oil exploration in the natural habitats of endangered species.
It sought to limit the use of nuclear energy.
It used new technologies to increase agricultural yields in developing regions.

topic.text: 9.1: Advances in Technology and Exchange after 1900

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
